Nike is known for designing, creating, and selling shoes that are specific to NBA players who have achieved a certain status in the game or who are superstars. Such player edition models include ones associated with current mega-stars as Kobe Bryant, Kevin Durant, and LeBron James.

Customers can choose specific color schemes for the sole, midsole, the swoosh, the laces, and heel. As well, special materials such as mesh, leather, suede, and more can be chosen and applied to http://www.dunksshop.com/Nike-Hyperfuse-Low-Max-Orange-Total-Orange-Cannon for which they are available. Customers are often able to create a unique sneaker with colors, materials, and patterns perhaps unseen anywhere else. It all depends on the creativity, style, and individuality of each customer.

Nike basketball shoes on the market right now

Performance
Give it a try and feel the difference when you wear the Hyperdunk instead of the usual shoes. Wear them with a black track suit for a professional look. The shoe defines the look, style and gives body control and secure ankle grip. Jumping, pivoting and landing are secure with a pair of Hyperdunk. The ease of move, flexibility and grip is important when you play basketball and Hyperdunk prove the rule.

There are a lot of basketball shoes on the market right now. In fact there are a lot of Nike basketball shoes on the market right now. As a consumer of http://www.dunksshop.com/nike-hyperdunk-2010-highlighter-varsity-pink-black , it has never been a better time to be a sneakerhead. That is because there has never been so many different models of Nike basketball shoes available. Additionally, there has never been so many different colorways in which to buy a pair of Nike shoes for basketball. A few years back Nike rolled out it's "Hyper" series of basketball shoes. The Nike Hyperdunk is one of the shoes that was part of that series.

The 2011 Hyperdunk continues to impress with its performance-based, versatility. This shoe has been praised for its low weight and breathability on the court. Overshadowed by the Kobe Bryant signature sneaker line for the last 3 years, this shoe truly delivers for each and every type of basketball player. Additionally, there is a colorway for every type of player. The 2011 edition of the Hyperdunk has released in 25 different colorways so far. You can trust in the fact that there are more on the way.

If you prefer the low-cut edition for more flex, try a few of their bestsellers: http://www.dunksshop.com/air-max-lebron-8 , Nike Zoom Kobe V, http://www.dunksshop.com/nike-hyperdunk-2011 .|

For Women: Nike comes in full red and white, black and white, and pink and white. All are high-cut series: Le Bron Zoom Soldier III, Hypersize Three Quarter, Blue Chip II Three Quarter, Shox Vision Three Quarter.

Basketball shoes from Nike include features you will not find in other brands. The Nike shoes for basketball incorporate the latest features and shoe technology like, in the case of Nike Hyperdunk TB Basketball shoe, flyfit technology at the upper side which offers maximum support. It has tensile fibers for lightweight support, super responsive cushioning, Phylum midsole, lunar foam in forefoot with midfoot wedge for lateral support, Nike Zoom unit in the heel for low-profile, and solid rubber outsole with herringbone pattern for good traction.

When Nike Dunk was initially introduced, it catered to only basketball shoes. The raw material used for making these was canvas. These shoes were adored and well appreciated by the basketball players, thanks to its comfy finish and durability. The shoes are tough enough to withstand heavy jerks and falls. These shoes have been made with the intention that they can be used roughly as well.

http://www.dunksshop.com/ is a brand which is synonymous with basketball shoes.

Size-wise, Nike Mid Premio SB - Donatello - TMNT is a 'mid' dunk in the realest sense of the word, manifesting as it does, as something truly between a low dunk and a high dunk. The gradient on the shoe starts right from the front part, right after the point where the toes go in, and climbs gradually; to reach the highest point at the tip of the tongue, where the shoe meets the wearer's foot-trunk. Of course, this is the structure that one expects on a dunk. At its highest, Nike Dunk Mid Premio SB - Donatello - TMNT towers at just about half a foot, definitely not high enough to be termed as a 'high' dunk, but then again not short enough to be termed as a 'low' dunk.

Color-wise, Nike Premio SB - Donatello - TMNT is a colorful shoe. On my particular pair, I can identify at least 5 different colors. First is light grey, which colors the bottom part of the shoe's mid-sized sole. Then there is white, which colors the upper part of the sole. Further on is the black, which colors the patch which connects the various parts which make up the shoe's upper body. Finally, there is dark brown (which colors the patch where the Nike tick originates), and purple, which colors the Nike tick itself.The high quality and durable sneakers can be sported by both men as well as women. There are new introductions to the shoes and sneakers year after year, thanks to the popularity and demand for Nike Dunks.
Some of the reasons for the popularity of these sneakers are:

Comfort, ease and toughness

Skating, surfing and BMX kids have always been associated with the too-cool-for-school gangs. And DC Shoes are worn not just by some of the biggest stars on the skateboarding scene, (the Lynx 2 shoe is unofficially the best skating shoe ever created) but by alternative punk bands and rock giants, such as http://www.dunksshop.com/nike-blink-182-dunk-high-white-smiling-face-arrow-blue-pink and Linkin Park. Now the label produces the widest variety of footwear and clothes for men, women and kids as well as specifically for extreme sports such as rally car racing and surfing. Co-founder of DC Sports and rally driver Ken Block is now sponsored by the brand - they recently launched a driving shoe because of their involvement in the rally scene. DC Shoes has become an iconic extreme sports brand, producing sports gear, clothing and shoes.

Co-founder Ken Block said he helped create the brand back in 1994 to fill a gap in the market. Skateboard shoes were plain and simple, but nobody had put any thought into the apparel. Block did something different - he put design and technology into the shoes. As the brand became more creative with technology and design, the market embraced it a lot faster than Block ever really imagined. Now DC Shoes is more than just a shoe manufacturer, it's an empire. The brand may have its heart in skateboarding, but it has expanded to embrace snowboarding, rally racing and more. And unlike other clothing brands, it actively takes part in contests around the world.

Originating in a history of basketball and baseball, High Top trainers were soon adopted by the music culture with a number of key people in the music industry putting their own stamp on the design - most noticeably Tom Delonge of http://www.dunksshop.com/nike-blink-182-dunk-high-white-smiling-face-arrow-blue-pink who brought us the Macbeth brand of trainer.

Now worn the world over by musicians and supporters alike, High Tops have now also become the trade mark shoe of Skateboarders and Snowboards across the globe. With brands such as Osiris and Vans coming on to the scene along with Nike and Adidas, there are a massive range to choose from no matter what sport you follow. As the great Converse always state whatever your sport, whatever your age, it's how good you are that counts.
Nike has carefully cultured a favorable demand-supply gap which amongst scarcity has bred customization craze, not to mention counterfeiters. Of course, the vacuum results uncontrolled price soars in the secondary market but it inadvertently has created a feverish craze and demand for customization. http://www.dunksshop.com/custom-nike-dunks are redesigned and/or texturized, by painting and dying to make them look different and cool depending on the skill level of artists. Long running green/gray shapes characterize these shoes flowing from the lacing eyelets till the front panels. There is one more coveted custom piece, created by C2 Customs they are the most circulated shoes images on webscape, and only there. There is some solace to the die-hard fan, though; the same designer is up to creating another pair to be christened as Submerged Safari. Although these are going to be typically released in less numbers, I am sure fans are waiting with their fingers crossed for the next "Shoe Rush".

Sam Atherton is a writing industry specialist for shopping products.

Striking ShadesNike has released the http://www.dunksshop.com/air-max-lebron-ps last April because the fruits of their well-liked LeBron eight basketball shoes series. Created simply in time for the NBA Playoffs, this could be the kick of selection by LeBron James as he goes head on with the rest of the Miami Heat in pursuit of the 2011 NBA Championship. This latest incarnation will go with all types of colors. but one of the most anticipated of all the colour combinations is the colorway that appeared to be a practice of types to LeBron shoes. it is the Dunkman series that spells nice news for all sneaker fans. there will be a LeBron 8 PS Dunkman. And well, this evidently will not disappoint.First stop, what exactly is the hype regarding the Dunkman series. Well, the Dunkman is a colorway in the http://www.dunksshop.com/air-max-lebron-ps line whereby the colours gray and "Mean Green", a shade of neon green, is the predominant color of the shoes. Also, the Dunkman, a brand based mostly on the silhouette in LeBron James' initial dunk within the NBA, is included at least somewhere in the shoe. At first, it started as a "player edition" shoes, which means it is a colorway that only James (and maybe a couple of associates) has ever worn. only few pairs are made from these colours and are never created for sale to the public. However, perhaps attributable to public demand, the Dunkman colorway has created it into production in a number of the assorted LeBron shoes, with limited numbers being sold to the general public. And now, this silver and inexperienced color combination is creating its thanks to the newest iteration of the LeBron series, dubbed as the http://www.dunksshop.com/Nike-Lebron-8-PS-Dunkman Edition.The Nike Air Max LeBron eight PS Dunkman Edition might not be the simplest Dunkman variant of all time for a few sneaker heads, however it has to be up there. the employment of colours was simply excellent. The flashiness of the "Mean Green" neon is in full impact here, and is accentuated any by the silver base. the base is both distinctive and eye-catching, as the silver used is of a metallic shade. In fact, it looks just like the shoe has been chromed out. These shades of chrome and neon produce a visually placing image for the shoe even when being viewed from afar. To conclude, the Dunkman LeBron eight PS may be one among the best interpretations of the Dunkman colorway, and can go down collectively of the additional interesting colorways ever incorporated in an exceedingly http://www.dunksshop.com , regardless of the model kind is.

The Most Popular Low Cut Shoes For Basketball

The low-cut, high performance basketball shoe is here to stay. There are more of these shoes on the market than ever before. Multiple editions and colorways of both Nike and Jordan Brand signature sneakers are widely available for purchase at all the major sports retailers. Ever since the Kobe IV burst onto the sneaker scene, there has been a major shift in the cut of basketball shoes that ballers have purchased. A shift from high and mid-cut shoes to that of the low-cut variety. And one of the most popular low-cut basketball shoes currently on the market is the Nike Hyperfuse 2011 Low.

There are plenty of very good reasons this shoe is so popular. One of the reasons is in the name of the shoe itself. Hyperfuse. This design material is the most innovative element that has been used on a basketball shoe in the last few years. Hyperfuse is a combination of three different materials fused together by intense heat. The Hyperfuse material creates the maximum in lightweight breathability and durability. This innovative Hyperfuse material is used on the upper of the shoe.

Another reason this shoe is so popular is the responsiveness that is created by it's traction control system. A solid rubber outsole with a herringbone traction pattern allows for quick, slashing cuts on the basketball court. Combined with it's lightweight and stable upper, the traction that this shoe provides is unparalleled in any other low-cut basketball shoe on the market. The solid rubber outsole is also responsible for the superior durablity that the Hyperfuse Low provides.

Many times a lightweight and durable basketball shoe will not be built with a high level of cushioning. That is not the case with this shoe. Both Nike Phylon and a Zoom unit are featured in the shoe's midsole and effectively create maximum impact protection. Another very good reason that this is the most popular low-cut shoe among serious ballers.

The Nike Zoom Hyperfuse 2011 Low is now available in a wide variety of colorways. Not only is this shoe technologically sound, it is one good looking shoe. A shoe that looks very good in more than one colorway. This shoe is truly one of the masterpieces that Nike shoes for basketball has made available for purchase. And has been the case with their other basketball shoes, you can bet on Nike dropping many more sick looking colorways on the Hyperfuse 2011 Low.
